sentences.sContent: She clamped her hands over her ears.
sentences.sCn: 她用手紧紧地捂住耳朵。

sentences.sContent: Creed opened his mouth to speak, then clamped it shut .
sentences.sCn: 克里德张口欲言，忽又闭口不说了。

phrases.pCn: 取缔；施加压力，强行压制
软管夹，软管夹子；软管卡

trans.tranOther: to put or hold something in a position so that it cannot move

trans.tranCn: 夹头， 夹具， 夹钳
trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment for holding things together
